請等待信箱檢查完畢: Please wait check your email address
請輸入半形的英文大小寫/數字，長度6-12位元: Please enter half-shaped English case/number, length 6-12 digits.
請輸入都到縣府: enter The capital of the prefecture
取得 Bonus 還有一個步驟: One more step to get a bonus
若無推廣碼可不填寫: If you don't have an invitation code, you don't need to fill it out.
我已年滿20歲，且我已了解資料僅作為本網站會員所使用，不會在其他地方使用。: over 20 years old. I promised and acknowledged that my personal information will only be used for membership registration on this website and will not be used for any other purpose.
感謝您註冊我們的新會員，真正非常的感謝您 ！: Thank you for registering as a member
您現在可以馬上進入遊戲裡盡情的遊玩我們為您準備的優質遊戲。: Go to the game now and enjoy the game
另外還準備了很多的特典在等待您!: we are waiting for you with various benefits
如果有任何不清楚的地方，歡迎您利用客服與我們聯絡。: you have any questions, please contact customer service support.
點選「開設帳號」就代表理解隱私權政策，也同意利用規約還有在マハラジャ不能持有複數: By clicking Open Account, you understand the privacy policy and agree to the Terms of Service and that you do not have multiple accounts at Maharaja.
請輸入正確驗證碼: Please enter the correct verification code
電話已存在: This phone number is already in use
電話號碼將用於發送確認碼，請輸入可以接收短信的電話號碼。: Please enter a phone number that can receive short mails as the phone number used to send the verification code.
2.從註冊會員的畫面點擊發送驗證碼。: 2. Click Send Verification Code from the member registration screen
3.驗證碼將會發送到您指定的手機。: The verification code will be sent to your registered phone number by short mail.
4.輸入驗證碼之後就可進行下一個步驟。: 4. Enter the verification code to proceed to the next step.
5.您需要填寫您的姓名、暱稱、出生日期等。: 5. In the next step, you will need to fill in your name, nickname, date of birth, etc.
6.開戶後，您將通過一封簡短的電子郵件收到有關 Club Maharaja 的信: 6. After opening an account, you will receive information about Club Maharaja from a short email
已發送驗證碼，短時間內請勿重複發送: The verification code has already been shipped, so please do not reship it for a while.
字母和數字的組合在20個字符以內: Up to 20 characters including alphabets and numbers
請輸入半形的英文大小寫/數字，至少要有一個英文大寫與英文小寫與數字: Please enter half-shaped English case/number, at least one English uppercase and English lowercase and a numbe
請確認已年滿18歲: Make sure you are already 18 years old
